lead_paragraph: Luca Toni scored in the 115th minute and headed in another goal on the final play of the game to put Bayern Munich in the UEFA Cup semifinals with a 3-3 tie at Getafe, Spain. The result left the home-and-home series tied at 4-4, and Bayern advanced, 3-1, on away goals.
